templates.name: Nature's Canvas - Landscaping
templates.description: Free landscaping website template with professional design featuring hero section, service showcase, portfolio gallery, and contact form. Warm earth-tone color palette with responsive Bootstrap 5 design. Perfect for landscaping companies, lawn care services, and outdoor design businesses.

templates.name: Wave Riders - Surf Shop
templates.description: Free surf shop ecommerce template with vibrant ocean-inspired design, product showcase, and surf lesson booking. Built with Tailwind CSS featuring custom gradients and smooth animations. Perfect for surf shops, beach gear retailers, and water sports businesses.

templates.name: Paws & Hearts - Dog Rescue
templates.description: Free dog rescue website template with heartwarming design featuring adoptable pet galleries, adoption process timeline, and success stories. Built with Tailwind CSS using warm earth-tone colors and impactful messaging framework. Perfect for animal shelters, rescue organizations, and pet adoption centers looking to connect dogs with loving families.
